description: Norwegian winters are notoriously cold, with harsh winds and blowing snow forming part of daily life. For these conditions, when both performance and warmth are priorities, reach for these Blackcomb base layers. A carefully tested, precisely created bottom layer, conceived with detail, style and functionality in mind. A slim cut performance layer for snow sports and many points in between.
name: Odlo Blackcomb Eco Bottoms - Mens

specs.value: 69% Recycled Polyester, 14% Recycled polyamide, 10% Polyamide, 5% Recycled elastane, 2% Elastane

Highly functional sportswear with excellent thermal insulation that keeps the body warm when it's cold outside. With the fabric's effective moisture wicking properties, the skin is kept dry and warm. Warm thermal quality is ideal for all winter activities
